title: Ep. 63 - Piss Limbo Kids
description:
On today's show, the boys talk about Garth Brooks, the Norte Dame fire and what each of the guys would save from respective homes if they were to light on fire, dumb games we used to play when we were young, Russell Wilson being one of the most insufferable humans on the planet, the absence of LeBron James diminishing the play of the NBA playoffs, too much NBA, dumb lawsuits, old porn vs new porn, blindness vs deafness, earthquakes, tornados, and they try to help Todd out with an issue he’s having at home.  Enjoy this one.  We sure did.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and @baileymccomas, and ends with a banger from the one and only, Garth Brooks.
dc:creator: The Pod
